<<<code>>>: for (LinkModel model : obj.getLinks()) {
Link l = new Link(model.getLink(), model.getDescription());
links_.add(l);
}

<<<explanation>>>: You can use the Java 7 Stream API to achieve this. The Stream API allows you to process a collection of elements using lambda expressions and intermediate operations. In this case, you can use the `stream()` method on the `obj.getLinks()` collection to create a stream of `LinkModel` objects, and then use the `map()` method to convert each `LinkModel` to a `Link` object. The resulting stream will be an `Iterable<Link>` that you can add to the `links_` list.
